Example use cases of the TransferFunction Class¶

Creation of Transfer function of two signals¶

You have two signals of which you want to calculate the transferfunction/quotient.

 1# Import
 2from RIRR import Signal
 3from RIRR import TransferFunction
 4
 5# Load incomming and outgoing signal
 6incomming = Signal(...)
 7outgoing = Signal(...)
 8
 9# Generate TransferFuction
10tf = TransferFunction(incoming_signal=incomming,
11                      reflected_signal=outgoing)
12
13# Generate new Transferfunction on Terz (1/3 Octave) base
14tf_oct = tf.get_okt(fact=1/3)
15
16# Plot both
17fig, ax = tf.plot_hf()
18fig, ax = tf_oct.plot_hf()
